name: Cannot update the integer param of "number_of_done_iterations_to_show" of project with extreme values -- @1.1

steps.name: Given I set up a "PUT" request to "/projects/{proj_id}" endpoint
And I set up the data
Then I get a "400" status code as response
And I verify the general_problem of error is: "Your project must load enough done iterations to calculate your velocity according to your settings."

parameters.name: message
parameters.value: Your project must load enough done iterations to calculate your velocity according to your settings.

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Functional Test Negative Cases of Update Projects
